item.title: Help importing postings
item.description:
Hi, I found the following script:
insert into koken.koken_text select ID, post_title, post_content, post_excerpt, 0, 0, unix_timestamp(post_date), unix_timestamp(post_date), unix_timestamp(post_modified), '', md5(concat(post_title,post_date)) from wordpress.wp_posts where post_status = 'publish' and post_content != '' and post_type = 'post';
this doesn't seem to work anymore. Looks like stuff changed since 2013. I want to import my Wordpress-Postings into Koken, though I don't see any. I assume the database-entries changed?
Is there another way to import Wordpress-message bulk-wise?

item.title: Plugin Tutorial
item.description:
I followed this step by step: http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/articles/835102-building-your-first-plugin
The plugin appears in the backend (after clearing cache) and indicates that it's been "enabled" but does not insert the alert into the head (of the front end or backend) leading me to believe that the plugin tutorial is out of date or non-functional.
Please revise.

item.title: skip like feature to scroll over thumbnail photo
item.description:
Hello,
I really want to make it so the user can scroll the mouse over a thumbnail pic and it creates an iskip (or this is the closest term i have found to describe this feature). In other words as you scroll the mouse over a thumbnail the image changes to other images in the album. It is the same feature in iPhoto when you fun the mouse over a photo album. Here i found an example but for wordpress:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/dsidxpress-iskip/
I am using the elementary theme. Any one have any idea how i can do this? I've been looking forever and can't seem to find a solution....
Thank you so much anyone for any suggestions,
Lilly

item.title: Finally, Facebook comments plugin for Koken
item.description:
Finally it's here: Facebook comments for your Koken site. Thanks to Martin Herbst and Koken Community Support, we can now enjoy not only the "like button" but we are also able to connect via comments to Facebook. :)
Get it here: http://kokensupport.varoystrand.se/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=156
Best regards, Bjarne Koken Community Support - http://kokensupport.varoystrand.se/

item.title: Scrolling in Madison theme
item.description: Hello, I was wondering whether it is possible to have a horizontal scrolling in Madison theme instead of vertical?

item.title: Overriding Core Functions
item.description:
Hi everybody,
currently I'm developing a custom plugin. To make it work correctly I need to extend/override two core functions located in /app/site/site.php and /app/tag/TagTitle.php.
Koken's API is not documented, so I wonder if anyone knows how to extend kokens core without touching files in the "app" folder.
Thanks in advance and cheers Chris

item.title: Multulanguage suppoprt
item.description:
Good day.
Could you please let me know if there is a multi language support implemented in the KOKEN? I really need it, but i was not able to find it in the AXIS. Probably anu other theme supports it? Or should i setup another site with another language? Appreciate your help.
Regards, Sergey Semikov

item.title: different album template in same theme
item.description:
Can make two diffent album template in the same theme.
Maybe by showing it diffrent if comming from a set, og just the album list.
Saw that you can make your own templates, but that's only for one page? And i saw that you make the link go to another tamplate, like the set link
But can you make that if you comes from a set viewing and clicking on a album it goes to another template that the default album template?

item.title: Adding Google + Address to my site
item.description:
http://edbeckphotography.com
Theme: Madison 2
I have the social media icons on the navigation bar, but my Google + address is incorrect. Where do I set the address? (https://plus.google.com/u/0/+EdBeckPhotographyPuyallup/about)

item.title: Slidshow Editor does not work
item.description:
Hello Koken Team,
I try to build a coustom theme and until now everything is fine. Thank you for the great tutorial. I insert a Sildeshow to the HOME-Site with and it works. Now I want to edit the slideshow setting with the Site console in the CMS but it does not work. Any changes I have made do not work. The changes are not accepted and the "No changes"-button is still inactiv. Is there a way to edit the Slideshow-setting in an other way to get something like this http://ironsummitmedia.github.io/startbootstrap-full-slider/?
Thanks for help. Tim

item.title: Theme boulevard - albums masonry gallery
item.description:
Hello!
Hi just discovered Koken yesterday, and I want to make my portfolio with this CMS. I'm customising the boulevard theme, and as I'm not really skilled in code, I don't know how I can display my albums in a "masonry" style.
I use the theme "boulevard" who perfectly fit my needs, but when I click on an set of album, it shows some thumbnails like that: http://oi60.tinypic.com/1pdzl0.jpg As you can see, the thumbs are… "line by line", and doesn't fill the gapes between each others…
But I want theses thumbnails to show like that: http://i62.tinypic.com/2s8im11.png (from the "Ensemble" theme)
I tried some jquery scripts but I don't know a lot about JS and nothing worked… I read "Using Pillar" tutorial, but doesn't seems to work, actually it doesn't change anything :/
Is there any simple ways I could do that, without many coding skills?
By the way, thanks for Koken, it's very easy to use, and totally functional :)) I really like it!
Cheers, Xavier
(sorry if my english is bad)

item.title: Can you get auditing essay help from custom essay writing service?
item.description: Essay Writing Service is one of the important topic.Custom essay writing service is providing to Accounting ,Auditing ,Chemistry ,Physics and Biology ,Botany etc.all types of essay writing .Auditing essay writing is following to all types of Small and large scale companies .It is maintain yearly once and auditing is one of the important one. http://www.essayscouncil.com

item.title: Can you get auditing essay help from custom essay writing service?

item.title: How to show Album content grouped by categories?
item.description:
I want to show an album page grouping the content by categories. I tried in several ways unsuccessfully. How I can manage it to work?
Thank you

item.title: Aspect ratio change on breakpoint (responsive aspect ratio)
item.description:
Hi guys,
I'm working on a custom theme and would like to be able to change the image aspect ratio based on screen width. For instance I want the images to load as a square on mobile (ie 1:1) but on bigger screens would like an aspect ratio of 16:9. Is there a way to change the aspect ratio value based on a user defined breakpoint in Koken?
Thanks for the help.
Lex

item.title: Slideshow sizing
item.description:
I'm having some issues with the Pulse slideshow on the site I'm working up here...
http://www.lharepresents.com.php53-21.ord1-1.websitetestlink.com/
It's a modification of the Madison 2 theme. No matter what I do I can't get it to show all the image at all the widths. It either crops top and bottom or left and right and I'm pretty sure I've tried all the different options for the sizing. I've currently got it set to height="100%". The slideshow div that contains the Pulse code is definitely filling the space in the browser window and I just want the slideshow to show all the content in the frame. Is that possible?
-------
Just in case anyone from Koken is listening – I've sent two support requests (requesting a personal response) in relation to this over the last few weeks and neither have received any response. Not even an automated response. Is the contact system working?

item.title: OxyGen 1.9.3 available for download!
item.description:
My custom theme that I use for my personal Koken site is now ready for download!
This theme has up to now been "exclusive" for visitors to Koken Community Support: but now we want to share the "love" with everybody! ;) :)
Documentation can be found here: http://varoystrand.se/sidor/oxygen/ Downloads can be found here: http://kokensupport.varoystrand.se/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=32 Source code: https://github.com/BlackSkorpio/OxyGen
Hope some of you find it useful, if you do: don't hesitate to tell us by adding your site to our "Showcase your site" listing
Best regards, Bjarne Koken Community Support - http://kokensupport.varoystrand.se/

I have a small problem with the Image Protector plugin. I don't know how, I don't know why ; but it works only on my index.lens, and in album.lens.
When I'm in essay, essay, or my list of albums, the plugin doesn't work... You got any idea?

item.title: High priority!!!! Lightbox custom on Regale 2
item.description:
Hello there!
It's the fift mail without response, I'm worry because I launch my new website in a few days but I've some problem with the lihgtbox. Please, how can I customise the lightbox?
- I don't wan't to see the title of the website and title of the album writen down of the image in lightbox. I would like the caption appearing like an option, cliking on the "caption" word. Is it possible? How to do it? - I want to change the arrows in lightbox, impossible to do it for now. - I would like to keep the hehader menu in the lightbox. During a bug, I saw it apperaing like that, there was the lightbox mode with header menu on the top, how can I customise it? - last question, I've activated the google fonts plugin but no fonts available on the typography settings. Is it normal? Do I need to use CSM custom to change fonts?
Thanks for your help.

item.title: Clicky Analytics for Koken

Cheers, Marcin

item.title: insert HTML into ONE page only?

I want to set up a Shopify store, and it would need custom HTML, but I only see a way to add it to ALL of my pages, and I would only need it on one. Choppily provides HTML code for each item I'd be selling, and I just want to have one page with a grid of items. As of now I can only add HTML to my entire site, which doesn't work for what I'm trying to do.. Using Repertoire theme. thanks in advance!

item.title: Koken:link to="custom" directs to homepage not custom lens
item.description:
Hi guys,
I've followed the information I can find about creating a custom content lens (cbox_content.lens) and adding it to info.json with:
"cbox_content": { "name": "Colorbox Content", "description": "Displays a colorbox overlay of images/content", "source": "content" },
However, when I click an image wrapped in it directs me to the homepage!
How can I fix this?
Cheers,
Rupert

item.title: Setting dependencies: what is wrong?!?!?
"REGALE 2" – Count of collumns in different Albums

Hey!
I wonder if there is a possibility to actually have a different count of columns in albums. or generally a different display option. i.e. a grid for one album and a horizontal scroll gallery for another. Would be great to have some more options on that as some projects have to be displayed differently.
Thank you :-)

item.title: Pulse settings not saving on custom theme.
item.description:
I've got a custom theme that I'm trying to add a Pulse slideshow to the index.lens.
I can add the slideshow in fine and point it to the exact album I want with no problem, but when I try to change any of it's settings in the Koken admin dash, none of the settings will stay.
I click on the gear to make changes, but there is no save button so I figure I just click the "X" to close the "Edit slideshow" popup. But if I click the gear again, none of my settings stay; they all revert back to the default 3:2 size, no cropping, etc .
I've tried clearing the api cache, but my settings still will not stick. Any help would be appreciated.
-Nick

For exampe I got 2 albums: characters & episodes. I want to make little navi in template which will have a button to go to the latest episode in episodes album and it will change automaticly when I upload next photos.

item.title: breadcrumbs
item.description:
Hi guys,
Is it possible to make a custom breadcrumb by using one's own layout? So one can for instance use the following setup: Album name > image (remove the .jpg) > 1/17 Or even choose how one wants to display the breadcrumbs? There don't seem a lot if options to choose from.

item.title: Sell custom themes / plugins through the koken store?
item.description: I'm just wondering, if it is right now possible, to sell custom themes or plugins through the koken store?

item.title: Second instalation of Koken
item.description: I am going to use Koken for a new site. So, I have installed it a second time in a different server. How can I have access to the plugins I have already bought? I have to buy them a second time?

item.title: Publish to live while designing custom theme
item.description:
I'm currently working on my own theme (started from Blueprint theme). I use an external editor to modify lens and css files on the server, which are picked up fine by Koken while in draft view. However, I run into the following issues.
* Whenever I change the info.json I need to re-apply the theme for Koken to pick up on the changes. Although not a major issue it does remove any changes I made to the primary navigation. It would be nice to retain (in the info.json navigation settings) the primary navigation.
* After changing css or lens files, how can I publish to live as Koken does not detect changes to the draft and does not enable the Publish button. I currently circumvent this by making changes in the settings panel within Koken, but I really would like a 'forced publish' button to be available.
In summary, a Theme Developer mode would be nice to resolve these issues. Most pressing is the second issue as I need this quite a lot when checking across browsers.

item.title: Canonical URL don't work (Tag--Content-Page)
item.description:
Hi
my Theme based on 99% on Axis. I've added Tag/Categorie-Features from Blueprint and make an Tagcloud for Navigation.
My Online-Version from Koken is: 0.19.4, my Theme based on Axis 1.5.2 => everything works fine.
Now i want update to Koken 0.21.2 and my Theme should based on Axis 1.5.3 and new Blueprint-Version.
=> Canonical-Tag don't work correctly on URL: http://domain.tld/tags/[TAG 1234]/content/[NAME OF PIC]/
Old-Version:
canonical is CORREKT og:url - no problem with this!
Updated Version:
canonical is the same as og:url ... wrong. "/tags/[TAG 1234]/" is wrong ... how can i move this? I can't find any hints in theme-sources ...
Same problem mit categories. Other canonicals works fine.
You can view the old version: www.fotobastler.de -> Tagcloud -> Click a Tag -> Click a picture - view Source Categories: click on Kategorien ...
The new version isn't public. I've modified tags.lens, tag.lens, events.html, categories.lens, category.lens from blueprint (on last update - online ... no update from new blueprint).
Any Ideas? TIA Patrick

item.title: Full Screen Slideshow Link
item.description: How can I link a full screen slideshow to a set or page by clicking the image. It's not implemented.

item.title: Custom navigation
item.description:
Hello, I am trying to do navigation manually with following menu: - Homepage - Album1 (submenu with 3 links *all, *first, *latest) - Contact Page - About author - Album2 (submenu with each link to each photo).
To be honest I can do almost all submenus manually with just static link to each page, but Album1 needs dynamic link to *latest which will change every done update at that album.
I will just edit NAV in index because I cannot set submenus at admin panel (or did not notice that possibility). I would be very grateful for any ideas /help how to create custom navi like that.

item.title: Link back to all albums an image is contained in?
item.description:
Hi Everyone,
I've got a collection of Featured Images that display on my home page. You click an image and get the details page. Is there a way to include a link or links to the parents albums that image is contained in?
For example, if I have an outtake from a story in the Featured Images set and someone clicks that image from my home page, can I then have a link on the details page that would take the user to the album with the rest of the story?
I've tried various iterations of with but it seems those variables are empty inside the Featured set.
Thanks! -Brett

Hello,

item.title: Feature Request: Embedded Theme Editor
item.description:
Hi,
I've had a little test site set up for a while. I think Koken is great, I can upload media, edit pages and tinker from any old browser, even my phone, it makes my normal editing process look awkward.
I've never been too enthusiastic on the themes though. Which got me thinking...
Could you present the files controlling the theme through the Koken interface? So I can duplicate/edit themes inside the browser. It could promote more creative content.
Cheers, Dave.

item.title: Change background-size of koken:background
item.description:
Hi guys,
First I have to say that I am a big fan of koken ! Great job !
But I need some help. I made a custom template and I try to implement a full screen slideshow. I need to use koken:background and to change the attribute "background-size" (which seems to be by default at "cover").
Is that possible ?
Thanks

item.title: Koken responsive images placed client side?
item.description:
Hi
I am exploring placing images on page client side, in response to user interaction. If possible, I would like to take advantage of Koken's ability to serve responsive images. In lens, I do that by using:
is there a way to place an image on page client side using javascript that is then loaded by Koken responsively rather than loading a specific image. The page output from:
appears to be something like:
I could mimic this in javascript, but I don't think I know what:
http://localhost:8888/koken/storage/cache/images/000/003/image3,
or:
1348672193.jpg
are from the data sets.
Any pointers or advice greatly appreciated.
Regards Mike

item.title: Custom PHP for redirect
item.description:
Hi.
I've created a custom .lens template called "mobile.lens". It's a one page design, which I'm looking to use for all mobile devices.
But, here's the catch. Since I can't put any PHP in a .lens file, I'm kinda stuck on how to redirect from index.lens to mobile.lens (Or 'website.com/mobile'). Found this nice little tool: http://mobiledetect.net But I'm kinda worried I will not be able to get it to work.
If, at all, possible, I'd prefer to make it work with PHP instead of Javascript.
Anyone any advise on this matter? Would be very helpful.
Thanks in advance!
Cheers.

item.title: Link from set directly to first album in set
item.description:
So in my custom theme, I have a list of sets (sets.lens) which link to each set (set.lens) which lists the albums in the set as links to each album (album.lens). I would prefer to have the link in the list of sets (sets.lens) link directly to the first album (album.lens) in the set. Is this possible at the moment? Plans in the future?
Thanks, Dominic.

item.title: {{ content.url }} and lightbox
AXIS 2 theme too large pictures
item.description:
hello
I'm using the theme axis and I would like to decrease the display size pictures. In the Timeline photos are too big.
How to proceed?
For information when I go to the custom css option, nothing appears, no coding !!!!
Thank you
fdw

item.title: Is there a "development mode" for themes?
item.description:
Hi These days i "discovered" koken. I really like what i've seen so far and started to develop my own theme. "My" theme i work on is installed on my local koken installation. When i want to check changes after editing a file, i can see it "immediately" on the "draft" view of the "Site" within the admin interface. Fine. But if i want to see it on the "public" version of my koken instance, i have to do another few clicks to publish the changes of my theme. Is there a way to modify my "koken development environment" which would allow me to see the changes on my theme immediately without "publisihng" the theme every time (just by reloading one browser window)?
By the way. I also like your documentation, but to be honest, i haven't read all the tutorials, yet. (I hope i haven't oversight the answer for my question in the docs.)
kind regards, Christoph

item.title: Changes in elementary won´t take effect
item.description:
Hallo and Tag,
yesterday I started changing the language in the koken installation to german, which worked well so far on the backend (admin). I was able to get nearly everything in the library to be german. Now I started today in changing the frontend to german. But also after several times of system and browser cache clearing the changes do not take place. Front end like: share / previous / next / pagination still shows up in english. I am a little confused.
I was also thinking about to use the Searchengine that is already integrated into the Library and working to use for the frontend. What do you think will that work ? By edding the Code from the lirary.tmpl.html to for example underneath the Navigation.
I am still not sure how to direct the Output to a Frontend site. But maybe someone elese has any idea on that.
Best regards Ali

item.title: Header do not display in a custom .lens page
item.description:
Hello,
I created a new .lens template to add a google map page with pictures location on it. Here is the structure of the .lens file I created :
#map-canvas { margin: 0; padding: 0; height: 100%; }
.... .... ....
The footer display correctly, but the header, which is based in an image, does not display. Moreover, once I have visited the "map" page, all other pages experience the same behaviour, ie, header does not display.
I also tried to adopt the structure defined in the help section (http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/articles/1140390-create-a-custom-page), with this structure instead :
<!DOCTYPE html>
.... ....
But I experience the same behaviour...
You can see an example of the issue here : http://www.romdicos.photography/koken/
You'll see the correct behaviour on the home page. Click on "map" in the footer section, and you'll see the issue I experience.
Many thanks in advance for your help,
Regards,

item.title: Change the navigation in elementary theme
item.description:
The behavior of the navigation is by default the following : 1- Click on an album displays all its images 2- Click on an image of the album displays the image in view primary and all others in thumbnail
I need to change what lines of code to avoid the click of the second step ? In fact, I want that by clicking on an album directly displays the first image in main view with the other images in thumbnail.
I did a lot of tests in many files but I can't. Thank you for help me.

item.title: Password Protect plugin and premium themes
item.description:
Hello, According to this : http://blog.koken.me/essays/2015/02/password-protect-plugin-now-available/ At the end of the post, there is this sentence : "Our premium themes – Axis 2, Madison 2, and Regale 2 – have been updated with custom login templates to match their unique style."
I undestand that, buying a premium theme, the plugin Password Protect is already provided and installed (by default), so I don't have to purchase the premium theme + the password plugin ?
Thank you in advance
Teddy Toulouse, France

item.title: Aspect Ratio of pictures
item.description: Hello, can someone help please? The picture aspect ratio at www.floriansonntag.com -> Portfolio -> select an album is not 100% correct and I don't know how to change it. I'm trying since a couple of days without success. Thanks!!

item.title: Plugins not showing
item.description: I am trying to install third party plugins manually copied to the storage/plugins folder and cleared cache/api but still the console is not showing the plugins. I think somethings wrong with the latest update.

item.title: Selective use of tags
item.description:
I would like to have some drop-downs that each use a subset of tags to define their content.
This structure gives me all of them:
{{ tag.title }}
Is there a way I can use koken if, or another construct, to restrict the content to only tags which contain specific text?

item.title: Plugin system changes in 0.20.0
item.description:
Hi there,
I would love to have some insight on the changes to the plugin system and what the new functionality that is available consists of.
I know 0.20.0 was just released so I understand that documentation can take some time, just wanted to show that there is interest :)
Cheers

item.title: Add custom logo support to custom theme
item.description: I've set up my own theme and want to add support for everyone to upload their own logo to a certain div. Is this doable so users can access this upload through the Site-page in the admin panel, or do I have to hack something together with custom css?

item.title: Selector * in custom css
item.description: The css selector ' * ' is not recognized in the CSS customization. How to make a custom font to take effect in the whole of the site?

item.title: Change in custom theme only appears in preview.php
item.description:
Hi!
I'm testing Koken on a local server and I'm trying to do a custom version of Elementary theme. So I've duplicated Elementary folder, renamed it Elementary_custom, selected it in admin and started editing .lens files with Sublime Text 2.
My issue is that changes made to the theme seems to appear only in preview, for example changes made on index.lens are visibles at localhost:8888/koken/preview.php and not at localhost:8888/koken/
I must be missing something but haven't found answer anywhere, please can someone help me.
Thanks in advance, Lowee

item.title: Fully custom theme
item.description:
Hi,
I'm having a difficulty to understand what can I actually do with Koken in terms of a custom theme. The case is simple: I have my own design and want to have my own functionality. That means tweaking with CSS of existing themes won't help me out. How does this go together with what Koken provides? Can I use Koken only as a CMS for my own site?
Thanks for the info!

essay link open in modal

Hi guys,
I'm creating my own theme with bootstrap, I'm trying to make link in essays.lens and have it open in modal but it returns empty. How can I have the essay in question appear in modal on same page "essays.lens"?

item.title: photo titel
item.description:
Hi,
I am just setting my page with Axis theme and I am having a problem:
Photo titel are displayed, even though everything is right in the settings. What am I missing? Please help me as soon as possible.
Many thanks Dubravka

item.title: Load all Contents (photos) from within a Set
item.description:
Hi,
Any tips on how to load all photos from within a particular set (including all photos inside sub-sets and albums - basically all photos that are children of the chosen outer set)?
Any advice greatly appreciated.
What I've tried:
1
>>I'm guessing this doesn't work because the category would have to be applied to the individual images
2
>>I'm guessing this doesn't work because filter ids do not work with 'Contents' data-types (http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/articles/828690-lens-tags#filtertypes)
3 Also tried using conditionals with lens variables , but this approach doesn't seem to work because there are no Data Variables for 'Contents', and the Global Variables don't seem to apply. (http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/articles/982033-lens-variables)
Thanks!

item.title: Background
item.description:
I am looking to add a responsive background to a custom template however I cannnot get .container to maintain 100% height on the browser (it only uses about half of the browser)
Could anyone share an example of a background image?
I am using filter.id to specify the image.
Thanks,

item.title: Variable (path to original image)
item.description:
Hi, is there a variable available for the path and file to the original image which is displayed in he lightbox. "{{ content.presets.extra_large.url }}" does not work for me.
Thanks Dieter

item.title: Adding a responsive menu to a koken theme
item.description:
Hello folks,
Loving koken so far. I've been trying to figure out how to add something like http://responsive-nav.com/
to the Boulevard theme. I'll just need to add a class to the nav and include a few css and js files.
Anyone care to point me in the right direction?
Where can I find how is generated?
Kind regards,
Barry

item.title: Opacity Settings for Images on Albums page
html 5 video tag
item.description: I like to have a video in a loop in the background on my page. I suggest to use the video tag for that. In wich file would you intergrate that tag and on wich position? And how to make the video responive? I also tried it with css but I didn't succeed.

item.title: [Help Needed] Lightbox with Download + Social Media Stream
item.description:
Hello, we are considering Koken for a customer site and there are two things that we have not yet figured out if they could be supported.
Specifically the client is looking for a way to build a lightbox of images and then download those (ideally as a PDK). The second is a social media feed that pulls data from Facebook, Instagram, etc - for this latter request it seems like it would be something in the Timeline, but it seems not there yet.
This raises two questions: 1) Would these features be feasible 2) Are there developers on the Forum that would be willing to quote for there implementation.
Regards Neil

item.title: Canvas in header
item.description:
Hi there, As there has been no response to my last question I'll try a difference approach:
Does anyone know how I might include a container for a canvas in my ensemble theme, or can help me with a customisation of the Ensemble theme to allow this please?
Many thanks Paul

item.title: About reisen theme
item.description:
ı have a theme named REISEN. i ıntsall koken unproblem.but when ı wıl ınstall reısen thme with ftp to /storage/themes. i see a warning like that.
"Unable to transfer. This is most likely due to insufficient permissions. Verify both the destination path and permissions, then try again. If the problem persists, contact your system administrator or hosting provider."
But my permısssion koken 777. No problem there. in fıles like stroge or themes files permission is 755 and ı dıdnt change that. if ı try ı see other warning like that:
"Request denied. Please verify that the file or folder exists and that you have the necessary permissions on the server to perform the requested operation."

Hello

item.title: Pulse fullscreen issue
item.description:
Can anyone help me.
This works fine:
An image has not been set in the featured content section of the admin library.
However this does not:
An image has not been set in the featured content section of the admin library.
I have seen the fullscreen pulse documentation but it doesn't not seem to help.
Any help appreciated.
Archie

item.description:
Hey,
I deleted my custom CSS by fault. I did not press publish, so my Website still looks like it should, but how can i get back my custom CSS code? I does not appear anymore when i sign out/sign in.
Please help!
Best, Marius

item.title: Navigation HTML output
item.description:
Hi Guys,
is it possible that Koken produces a standard navigation like this:
--------------------------------------- Home Albums Interesting About Me ---------------------------------------
I need this because my theme is build with Bootstrap and it don´t work with the code which Koken creates.
--------------------------------------- HomeAlbumsContentEssaysAllgemein ---------------------------------------
I hope you understand what I mean because I am not very good in English.
Greetz, Jannis

item.title: Pillar not balancing images properly on page load
item.description:
I'm running into a weird glitch with Pillar. For some reason when the page loads the images aren't being balanced right. The first 3 pillars are fine, but part of pillar 4 is pushed to the bottom of pillar one. When I resize the window it fixes itself.
I do have the balanceColumns attribute set to true in the pillar function settings.
I'm also having an issue where if I set lazy loading as true, the images won't load when I scroll down to them. They will load when I resize the window though, but I'd have to do that every page down to see all the content.
Both these problems are fixed by resizing the window so I assume they're related. All other features of pillar are working fine.
An idea as to what the problem is?

item.title: Customizing Axis 2
item.description:
I have some questions about customizing my Axis 2:
- How can i get the same the same title-divider line-content on my created pages like on my content pages? I would be nice if every page looks the same. I can add a tag to my own pages so i get the divider line but the margins are not the same. On Koken content pages the distance between title - line - content is perfect but on my own pages the distance between title and line is bigger and between line and content its smaller... how can i get the same look?
- How can i change that the "read more" and images are not always centered. Sometimes i use smaller images that i want to be on the left side and not centered.
Any help is very appreciated.
Cheers, Daniel

item.title: Load content from this month/day
item.description: Is it possible to load content from the current month/day (any year) to be able to do a "On this date" type feature? In other words, load all content where the capture date's month and day are the same as today's.

item.title: primary cover image / changing scroll arrow position & size INDEPENDENTLY
item.description:
Regale 2 > primary cover image:
- What is the best way to change the size and position of the â€œscroll arrowâ€ INDEPENDENTLY from the theme â€œsocial media share links iconsâ€ and its â€œalbum descriptionâ€?
- Within the console settings panel it is possible to define in the â€œTemplate Setup-Panelâ€ the position, the vertical & horizontal padding, spacing of the cover-image-title, description, etc.
Well, the â€œscroll arrowâ€ is always positioned accordingly to the: - title - album description - share links icons
I would like to change the: - postion - size the â€œscroll arrowâ€ which are are layered on-top of the primary cover image INDEPENDENTLY. I mean having the the title, description, social icon positioned on the left but the â€œscroll arrowâ€ in the CENTER of on the the primary cover image.
Is this only possible by CSS-programming? What is the best way to do that? I would also like to change the â€Title line-hightâ€ on top of the primary cover image.
Suggestion for future issues for Regale 2: â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” It would be nice to have also the possibility to change within the â€œTemplate Setup-Panelâ€ the â€œTitle line-hightâ€ which is layered on-top of the cover image.
Keep going, you guys are doing a great job :-)

Thanks.

my website is http://lianggono.com/

item.title: Unable to sort photos
item.description:
Unable to sort with order_by="uploaded_on" with source="tag".
Load returns data with default order.

item.title: Strange behavior of koken:time Lens-Tag
item.description:
Hello,
I've been using koken for a while now and it is great! I use the regale 2 theme but have a weird problem with the content-page…
First of all, I made some small adjustments, so that the alignment of the elements fits my needs. But that included just removing some divs and rearranging some of the lens-tags.
Unfortunately I don't know if the following error occured before that, but I think it did… It's pretty strange.
When I open a URL to a specific picture (e.g. http://oliverdohle.de/content/090919-0167/), the date is shown relative. The same if I reload the page. But if I now go back and forth, the date is shown the right way - as an absolute date. In the source-code the tag is just written in the default way:
I also tried adding the options to it, but nothing helped:
The strange part is, that if a page was already loaded and the content-page is loaded dynamically, the date is shown correctly. Only if I directly open the deep-link to the picture, the date is shown relative.
I also tried going deeper into the code and looked at the time() function in /app/site/Koken.php… At the end of this function the code is echoed, so I modified the output before $text, to look if I am in the right function (kind of like a debug output to check whether I am on the right way in your code). And now I am even more confused! Again, everytime I open the page directly it simply shows the relative date and if I paginate, or open the picture from the grid it shows the absolute date including my "mark" that I put in the code. It seems if the -Tag is modified afterwards by JS or something, otherwise it would have to show the output that I hardcoded into the Koken-Core, wouldn't it?! So I don't think it has to do with the realtive-option of the time Lens-Tag, but something else…
Do you have any Idea how I can fix this? Or can you reproduce this on your side?
Thank you and best regards, Tim D.

item.title: Borders around images
Custom Font from HDD
item.description:
Hello,
I'm Chris and I'm new user - about 2 weeks of Koken. Almost everything I wanted managed to find in Internet or do by myself, to the point I'm thinking about completely new theme ;), but that's not nearest future, just as an introduction :).
So, to the core of problem - I'm using an Elementary theme on my site, and till now I've used fonts from google font. Today I've found new font - completely free - but it's not on any site like google fonts or typekit. So my idea is to upload the font to server and then somehow integrate it into theme - is it possible?

item.title: koken:keyboard_scroll – is it possible to use up/down keys instead of left/right?
item.description:
Hi there,
I'm currently putting together my portfolio site, and was wondering if it is possible to have the koken:keyboard_scroll tag use the up/down arrows instead of left/right?
I'm already using the left/right arrow keys to navigate to the previous/next album using the koken:link tag and the bind_to_key attribute and I feel like the up/down keys make more sense to scroll up/down within a given album.
Thanks a bunch in advance for your help!
